data.title: George Orwell – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about George Orwell. Browse George Orwell’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
George Orwell’s 1984

An Audible Original adaptation

By: George Orwell, Joe White - adaptation

Narrated by: Andrew Garfield, Cynthia Erivo, Andrew Scott, and others

Length: 3 hrs and 27 mins

Original Recording

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 5,547

Performance

5 out of 5 stars 5,312

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 5,311

It’s 1984, and life has changed beyond recognition. Airstrip One, formerly known as Great Britain, is a place where Big Brother is always watching, and nobody can hide. Except, perhaps, for Winston Smith.

5 out of 5 stars

A Revelation!
